H0.text: Who was the star of the 1940 satirical film 'The Great Dictator'. Charlie Chaplin

H1.text: Who was the star of the 1940 satirical film 'The Great Dictator'. Buster Keaton

H2.text: Who was the star of the 1940 satirical film 'The Great Dictator'. Harold Lloyd

H3.text: Who was the star of the 1940 satirical film 'The Great Dictator'. Chaplinian

A4.text: Chaplin's first sound film was The Great Dictator (1940), which satirised Adolf Hitler.

A5.text: It was this physical resemblance that supplied the plot for Chaplin's next film, The Great Dictator, which directly satirised Hitler and attacked fascism.
